column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Absolutely amazing.  This should be at the top of everyone's "must see" list in Chicago
column2: even if you don't consider yourself an art lover.  I'm bored with many art museums
column3: but I still loved the Art Institute and wished I could have spent an entire day here.  One morning just wasn't enough.  The museum is both huge and crowded
column4: but the staff are happy to make recommendations for specific things you might like if you're short on time.  While there are some very famous works of art here
column5: which are likely mentioned in other reviews
column6: be sure not to miss the America Windows.  They're in a back corner away from most other exhibits
column9: they were easily my favorite thing in the entire museum.
